title: View or edit environment
content:
This page explains how to view or edit an environment record.

View or edit environment

  1. Click  > Plan > Company. 
  2. In the Companies dropdown, click Environments.
  3. Click the ID of the environment you want to view or edit. The environment record contains the following tabs:
    Tab Description
    General View and edit environment details. View the product instances deployed in the environment and update their verisons. For more information, see the "General tab" section.
    Workflow View the workflow and current phase of the environment. The current phase of the environment is highlighted in blue in the workflow. 

    For information on the environment workflow and the procedure to change the phase, see the Environment workflow page.
    Discussions View conversations relevant to the environment. For more information, see the Discussions page.
    History View changes to the environment record. For more information, see the History page
  4. Click the tab you want to view or edit.
  5. Edit as required.
  6. Click Save on the toolbar.

General tab

The General tab has the following sections:

  • Environment details
  • Product Instances

Environment details

Field Description
Display label The display label for the environment.
Company The company that owns the environment.
Service Ignore this field, it is not functional in the current release.
Environment type The type of environment. The available options are Development, Non production, Production, Staging, Test, Trial.
Deployment type The deployment model of the product instances deployed in the environment. The available options are On premise, Public cloud, Private cloud.

Product Instances

Thise section displays the product instances deployed in the environment. You can update the version of a product instance from this section.

To update the version of a product instance:

  1. Select the product instance.
  2. Click Update version. This displays the available versions.
  3. Select the version you want to update to by clicking anwhere on the version record (except the ID). The record is highlighted in gray.
  4. Click OK. 
  5. Click OK in the Update version dialog box. The product instance is updated to the selected version.
